venue.name: Samuel Adams Statue-In Front of Faneuil Hall

item.description:
The tour will be led by a Boston by Foot guide. (www.bostonbyfoot.org/tours/north_end) The normal cost is $12 but I will have $10 discount tickets. So just give me $10 when you arrive and I'll give you a ticket. Please try to meet by 12:45. The tour will take us from the Statue of Sam Adams in front of Faneuil Hall to the Blackstone Block, edging by the Haymarket vendors, through the Greenway and down Salem Street into the North End. We will learn about the history, geography and sociology of this area. The tour will end at about 2:30 in North Square. We will then proceed to lunch at Villa Francesca on Richmond Street. (www.ristorantevillafrancesca.com) If you arrive after 1:00, please follow the route I mentioned above and you should be able to catch up to us. The event will be held rain or shine. If you can't stay for lunch, please say so in your RSVP. Lunch prices are: Appetizers $4-11, Salads $5-11, Sandwiches $11-14, Pasta $10-15, Meat/Fish $16-18. Note that we will only be accepting RSVP's for this event on Thursday 9/9, Friday 9/10 and until 11:00 AM on Saturday 9/11.

Please join us for an afternoon in Boston's historic North End.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be at a bench on the right of the statue as you face Faneuil Hall.
item.name: North End Walking Tour + Villa Francesca
